posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for? Administrator on the JailRP server

2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone): US, Eastern

4) Current In-Game Name: MairoDJW, 

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page: STEAM_0:0:21625962 , http://steamcommunity.com/id/mariodjw/

6) Email Address: REDACTED@REDACTED

7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server: Since November 2010, Moderator of JailRP

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)?: Administration in JailRP

9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?: NNJG has a great servers with a good userbase, nice staff, and has welcomed me in.

10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience: Yes to all of them.

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?: No

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?: Yes, and about half of the time

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide: I feel that many of the current Jail admins have moved on to TTT, and Jail could use an active administrator.  I still need a few recommendations and hope I might get the rest here.

 http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/540637121884874810/90E025367EAB94098BD5BC12245660B7DBD315EA/ 

 http://i55.tinypic.com/2mh7gnq.jpg

Personally I haven't seen him on the jail server --because I don't go on it-- but I still  support  this application because of the way he acts on the forums. He's friendly and seems like he would make a great addition to the Jail Administrative team.

I've seen you on the Jail server, you are polite and would make a great addition. I  support  this.

Good luck, Mario :) (oh and you spelled your name wrong on the title xD)

To Gash - I've only seen you on once.  It was when chat was broken, and you came in and typed on sentence and then left lol.

To Mark - Thanks for pointing that out, I would spell my name wrong.

I've been on Jail less than five times in total, but the times I was on, I have never seen Mario do a single thing wrong.
 +support

Congratulations, you've been accepted for the position of Administrator on Jail!
(Confirmed by Gash)
